title: This is not league of legends
body: Now by the title you can see with your two eyes thats yes this is not league of legends now when i started playing league of legends i thought this would be a good time you know having some fun getting kills being a support stealing baron and stuff well then i noticed something and its that twisted tree line aram there not league of legends i would love to see them in the rotation for the games but like idk the only game mode anyone cares about now is well urf which is a reall fun game mode but like come on riot i know that theres no way to inprove on this but just remove it and put it in the rotation of game modes and besides your doing so that way people always want to play it more becuase it would only be out for like the weekend anyways i am KST ULTRA and peace out my friends

replies.body:
Yeah it's not league of legends, Rito deleted the Lore that makes the game title even make sense.

They deleted the League.

i agree with you on this one the lore on league of legends used to be great with alot of back story and me i love my lore and i like the lore of  champions and other things to but now there just saying its all just some imaging thing
